Package tl.GUI

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TGUIClickedEvent  
    TGUIEvent  
    TGUIInterface
    TGUIInterface is the main interface for all TGUIComponents.
    It provides TGUIComponents the ability to update(draw, etc.) and to accept input commands.
    The functions provided are to be used in conjunction with Slick2D's update/render/command functions.
    TGUILoopEvent  
    TGUIMouseOverEvent  
    TGUISelectionEvent  
    TGUITextEvent  
    TGUIValueEvent  
    TIGUICollection  
    TIGUIScrollable  
    TIGUISelectable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TButton  
    TButtonToggle  
    TContainer<T>  
    TGUI  
    TGUIComponent
    TGUIComponent is the base class from which all other TGUIComponents derive from.
    The TGUIComponent can be inherited to create almost any other user defined TGUI.
    TGUIHBoxLayout  
    TGUILayout
    TGUIView is an abstract class that provides the basic functionality for TGUIVerticalView and TGUIHorizontalView.
    TGUIViews set properties for each component in the layout, and positions/stretches/organises them to meet the size of its parent.
    If the parent is set to null, then the TGUIView uses the TGUIManager's properties instead.
    TGUIManager  
    TGUIVBoxLayout  
    TLabel  
    TLabelExtended  
    TListBox  
    TListBoxDrop  
    TListBoxDropGen<T>  
    TListBoxGen<T>  
    TSlider  
    TTextBox

    TGUIComponent.ComponentType
    ComponentType represents a type of TGUIComponent for easy comparison and removal of ambiguity.
    E.g.
